DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety after administration of MP-424 to patients with chronic hepatitis C.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of MP-424 to Treat Chronic Hepatitis C
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnosed with genotype 1b chronic hepatitis C Patients naive to the concomitant medications with interferon Patients diagnosed with decompensated cirrhosis Patients diagnosed with positive HBs antigen in the test
